work.title: Graduate Research Assistant for iWERS at UofSC
work.description: I was assigned to develop and test custom ArcGIS WebAppBuilder Widgets and Plugins for the iWERS graduate group and the South Carolina Department of Transportation

work.title: Resident Mentor at the University of South Carolina
work.description: I took on the responsibility to be a resource to over 25 freshmen students at the University of South Carolina. I provided the students with campus locations, resources, news, and policy enforcement to assist them in achieving success in college.

work.title: Software Development Engineer in Test Intern at CVS Health
work.description: I worked on an sAFE Agile development team to test desktop, iOS mobile, and Android mobile applications for CVS Health's prescription ordering services.

work.title: Information Technology Support Service
work.description: I worked in giving IT support to the Chemical and Biomedical Engineering departments at the university of South Carolina. I built, imaged, and deployed systems enforcing the university's security policy, as well as troubleshooted system issues for faculty and students.
